document.full_text: syrian troops and tanks poured into deraa on monday, seeking to crush resistance in the city where a month-long uprising against the autocratic 11-year rule of president bashar al-assad first erupted.
document.title: syria sends tanks into deraa where uprising began
lines_and_colors: syrian troops and tanks poured into deraa on monday, seeking to crush resistance in the city where a month-long uprising against the autocratic 11-year rule of president bashar al-assad first erupted.
